title: Carol Hughes (author)
text:
Carol Anne Hughes (born February 14, 1961) is a British-born American writer of <a href="children%27s%20literature">children's</a> and <a href="young%20adult%20literature">young adult</a> novels. She has written about magic, <a href="Piracy">pirates</a> and princesses.
Carol Hughes lives in <a href="London">London</a> with her husband and daughters.
Writer.
Hughes wanted to be an actor as a schoolgirl, and she went to art college, but on both occasions she found herself writing stories instead.
External links.
WARNING: As of May 2015, the Library of Congress and WorldCat record for Carol Hughes are incoherent (more information <a href="%23Notes">above</a>).
